Explore

SPANISH PROGRAM

Honeymoon Destinations

Exotic Honeymoon Destinations: A colombian honeymoon can wrap you in a colonial charm together with ecotourism, island adventures, and vibrant city life excitement.

Capital Cities

Our vibrant city life attracts visitors seeking examples of advanced urban development, fashion trends, culinary specialties, cultural activities and shopping amongst a host of other activities.

Natural Parks

Our Caribbean and Pacific regions, along with the Amazon and Orinoco basin, boast 26 national ecological reserves, havens for ecotourists.

Community Work

Volunteering for aid and assistance projects in Colombia combines international volunteer work with an opportunity to learn or improve Spanish-speaking skills.
